CHAT.comment: Book Reading to Mother; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

context notes state that both Mot and Chi are seated on the couch. Mot has her arm around Chi and points to words in the book to make sure Chi reads them correctly. Chi reads well , but with little emotion. Mot helps Chi with the few words that he has trouble with (such as telling him pronunciation of cocoon) , and makes a few comments about the text. Mot is supportive of Chi , but not overbearing. They seem to enjoy reading together

u.a: Chi skips the page for Saturday
MOT holds page so Chi can guess before turning last page
